supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_01]: "Logging my time at the end of the day takes way too long. I have to click through so many screens just to add time for one project task. It's easily 10-15 minutes wasted."
[FDBK_08]: "The dropdown list for project codes is massive and in a random order. Finding the right code takes ages, and I've picked the wrong one by mistake more than once because I was rushing."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need a streamlined, simplified time entry process with intuitive navigation and easier project code selection.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_03]: "I travel a lot for client meetings. It's impossible to log time easily when I'm not at my desk. I wish I could just quickly add entries from my phone right after a meeting."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Employees require mobile-friendly time tracking capabilities to log hours conveniently from various locations and devices.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_02]: "The overall look is very dated. It feels clunky, and sometimes I'm not sure which button I'm supposed to press to submit my timesheet."
[FDBK_04]: "The system becomes incredibly slow, almost unusable, late in the afternoon, especially on Thursdays and Fridays."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: The portal needs a modern, responsive interface with improved system performance and clearer user interactions.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_05]: "Why can't I easily see a summary of my hours for the week broken down by project? I need this for my own records, but the portal doesn't offer a simple view like that. Generating reports seems impossible for regular users."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users require enhanced reporting capabilities with easy-to-access time summaries and self-service reporting options.

task_2_survey_design.survey_goal: Gather detailed insights about user experiences and specific improvement needs for the NovaTime time tracking portal to enhance usability, efficiency, and data accuracy.

survey_questions.question_text: How difficult do you find the current process of logging your work hours?
survey_questions.purpose: Quantify the perceived complexity of the current time entry process and validate the need for simplification.

survey_questions.question_text: Which device(s) would you prefer to use for logging time?
survey_questions.purpose: Understand user preferences for time tracking devices to inform mobile and cross-platform development strategies.

survey_questions.question_text: What specific features would most improve your time tracking experience?
survey_questions.purpose: Identify the most critical areas for improvement from the user's perspective.

survey_questions.question_text: How often do you struggle to remember and accurately log your work hours?
survey_questions.purpose: Assess the frequency of time tracking inaccuracies and the potential need for memory-assist features.

survey_questions.question_text: Please describe any additional challenges you experience with the current time tracking system.
survey_questions.purpose: Capture qualitative feedback and uncover potential improvement areas not addressed by structured questions.

supporting_evidence: Scenario Description: Concerns about user adoption rates and data quality
Initial Feedback [FDBK_01]: Excessive time spent on logging hours
Initial Feedback [FDBK_08]: Complicated project code selection process
Scenario Description: Goal to improve efficiency for employees
Initial Feedback [FDBK_03]: Difficulty logging time during travel
Initial Feedback [FDBK_02]: Dated and clunky interface
Initial Feedback [FDBK_04]: System performance issues during peak times
Initial Feedback [FDBK_05]: Lack of easy time summary and reporting features
Scenario Description: Importance of accurate project costing and resource management
